name: Little Dog
description: Little Dog - the original 2D platformer with attractive graphics, suitable for people of absolutely all ages. In this game you have to pass the levels for a small, but quite brave dog. Your main task is to collect the bones for the dogs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 300 MB DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
